text: 5:21 Aisaia 53:6-12; Jon 8:46; Rom 5:19; 1 Korin 1:30; Galesia 3:13; Filipai 3:9; Hibru 4:14-15; 1 Pita 2:22-24; 1 Jon 3:5Krais uabɨ arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ God kamaghsua, e Krais ko porogh, an gavgavimɨn e Godɨn damazimɨn gumazamizir aghuibar otivam. Kamaghɨn, God en akurvaghasa en arazir kuraba bar Krais gisɨn da arɨki, ezɨ Krais mati uaghan gumazir arazir kurabagh amir mamɨn mɨn oto.
